title: SOLD T206 Conroy.BVG 5 Sweet Cap Double Factory Back
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 Conroy.BVG 5 Sweet Cap Double Factory Back
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice example of Wid Conroy with Bat graded a 5 by BVG. This one has the scrolled out back that isnt aligned thus revealing the factory No 30 the scroll was supposed to cover. It is easily visible and readable. The factory 42 below is clear and printed well. The card it self has sharp corners, excellent centering and clarity. The color and registration are also top notch. A great looking card with a double factory back. Regardless if you like the double stamped back this is a solid BVG 5
199.99 net plus 5.99 for shipping with tracking
Bump for discount. Open to trades too
Price drop. Cool card with an interesting back
